title.rendered: Fine Art Services Launching In Singapore

content.rendered:
Malca-Amit Singapore Launches
Fine Art Services

Delivering Absolute Peace of Mind.

For decades, Malca-Amit has been providing our clients with a peace of mind when it comes to storing your precious metals and jewelry.
We are pleased to inform you that you can now have the same peace of mind when it comes to storing your fine art collections. Following our high standards of storing bullion and jewelry, our facility in Freeport provides an ideal environment for storage of fine art collections.

Our vaulting facility features:

  • Temperature and Humidity Control
  •  CCTV
  •  Non-liquid Fire Suppression Systems
  •  24-hours Monitoring.

Your art pieces will be carefully handled by our staff specialized in handling art pieces. Malca-Amit can tailor to each of our client’s needs while providing liability coverage for your precious art pieces.

Contact us for more information:
Email: Sales.sin@malca-amit.com
Tel: +65 6587 9135
